movies.title: Dasara
movies.description: In a town that is dependant on coal mining, The lives of three childhood friends turn chaotic when they get into a fight with the son of the village headman.

movies.title: RRR
movies.description: A fearless revolutionary and an officer in the British force, who once shared a deep bond, decide to join forces and chart out an inspirational path of freedom against the despotic rulers.

movies.title: Miss Shetty Mr Polishetty
movies.description: Miss Shetty is a feminist living in London and wants to be single forever. Mr. Polishetty from Hyderabad in Telangana, India, wants to be in a committed relationship. The two appear to be in different stages of life but somehow connect.

movies.title: Virupaksha
movies.description: A man must decode the secret behind a series of unexplained brutal deaths that leaves the villagers terrorised and shocked.

movies.title: Nani's Gang Leader
movies.description: Five women from different walks of life seek the help of Pencil, a small-time crime novelist, to avenge the deaths of their loved ones in a robbery.

movies.title: Shyam Singha Roy
movies.description: A director accused of plagiarism finds a transcendental connection to his past life when he digs deeper into his subconscious mind.
